com.tradersgem2.database

Class StocksDB<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tradersgem2.database.StocksDB<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<E>

    public class StocksDB<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<E>
    Model for the User's Stocks, this class is used to communicate with the DB to fetch information, manage user's stocks by providing the following functionality. It allows the adding new stocks to the user's porfolio, searching for stocks, getting quantities of owned/watched stocks, and saving/loading stocks from the stock DB.
    Author:
    pedro + Luiz
